note: Welcome to my little nudist mastodon-thing. This is where you’ll see some nudist-related stuff I made, along with a few reblogs from folks I like. I’m kind of a closet nudist, been too shy to publicly admit that I enjoy the freedom from clothing, but I have been a bit more open recently. For the past few months I was making some memes for the /r/NudistMemes subreddit, and I’ll be reposting those memes here, along with a few others I like. I’ll make sure to credit memes made by others. This blog is focused on nudist/naturist lifestyle and LGBTQ+ friendly. It is NOT a sexual or pornographic blog. Please do not send me any horny spam.
